content: remove your hook see photo five *pick up yarn a and double_crochet in the next st working in front of the chains of yarn b ch4 and remove your hook see photo six repeat from * alternating yarns a and b until you have worked around the blanket see photo seven using yarn a slip_stitch into the the base of the beginning ch4 of that colour and fasten_off repeat for yarn b and sew in all ends ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers
